enable_encryption.title: Enable Encryption
enable_encryption.description: Automatically enables encryption for Two-Factor if available.

set-encryption-key.title: Set Encryption Key
set-encryption-key.description: Sets a secure key that iThemes Security uses to encrypt sensitive values like Two-Factor codes.
set-encryption-key.help: iThemes Security will add a constant to your website’s wp-config.php file named ITSEC_ENCRYPTION_KEY.

confirm.title: Confirm Reset Key
confirm.description: Confirm you want to reset the encryption key to a new value.

rotate-encryption-key.title: Rotate Encryption Key
rotate-encryption-key.description: Updates all encrypted values to use the new encryption key.
rotate-encryption-key.help: If you’ve manually updated the ITSEC_ENCRYPTION_KEY constant in your website’s wp-config.php file, use this tool to update any existing encrypted values.
